title: Two-in-One Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['250g butter', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '160g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 eggs, beaten', '375g wholemeal self-raising flour', 'Version 1', '175g plain chocolate chips', 'Version 2', '5 tablespoons cocoa', "175g 'energy mix' of sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, sultanas and flaked almonds"]
